execCases.description: Test basic insert operations and their validations

gaeaActions.sql: CREATE TABLE tbl_test_insert (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, UNIQUE KEY unique_name (name))
INSERT LOW_PRIORITY INTO tbl_test_insert (name, age) VALUES ('User2', 25)
INSERT IGNORE INTO tbl_test_insert (name, age) VALUES ('User1', 31)
INSERT INTO tbl_test_insert SET name = 'User3', age = 20
INSERT INTO tbl_test_insert (name, age) VALUES ('User1', 32) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE age = 32
INSERT INTO tbl_test_insert (name, age) SELECT 'User4', age FROM tbl_test_insert WHERE name = 'User3'

masterCheckSQL.name: Check age for User1 after operations
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT age FROM tbl_test_insert WHERE name = 'User1'

masterCheckSQL.name: Check age for User2 after operations
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT age FROM tbl_test_insert WHERE name = 'User2'

masterCheckSQL.name: Check age for User3 after operations
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT age FROM tbl_test_insert WHERE name = 'User3'

masterCheckSQL.name: Check age for User4 after operations
masterCheckSQL.sql: SELECT age FROM tbl_test_insert WHERE name = 'User4'
